dmca.title: [ABUSE] copyright infringement
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 09, 2005 2:24 PM
To: exec@19nitten.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Roy <exec@19nitten.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Wednesday, February 9, 2005, 1:20:04 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] copyright infringement

===8<==============Original message text===============
Dear Sir

Trace route shows that you host this site:

www.dirtylovers.net

In their forum they allow people to post copyright protected pictures
without permission from the owners. When writing to them they do no answer.
Instead they post the email address to a lot of free link pages which
generates a lot of spam messages.

Since many of our copyrighted pictures are being posted there without our
permission then we want that site to be shut down.

Regards
Roy Wilhelmsen
www.19nitten.com




===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCCnF3vK/XpJs6oyURAgDoAKCh2n6wJ1xk91ibVjNzKK32j5zxOwCgmJYE
EfsC3nBa8IwR8rDYELSPfO8=
=Amz0
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
